text: 2.17: Mt 7.21; 1 Ko 7.31; Ze 1.10; 1 Pi 1.24Kha nuian zumgum vhɨzgirga. Kha nuiana bigi garav, nta nzuav ndavi khavav, rɨmgi phara tui tɨvi, nta vhɨra ana phorgɨp vhɨzgirga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi zɨn vui guma, ana kha nuiana phorgɨp vhɨzgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara, ana zazera mbara muuŋgip kɨrga.
